entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET location not found in ubuntu 22.04 #74688
  • Mono interpreter doesn't handle mutating `newobj` values through aliases #74687
  • Regex returning invalid match #74686
  • COSE needs to enforce that only NIST P-{256,384,521} are used #74684
    7.0.0
  • [Quality Week] Improve quality of Crossgen2 testing, most notably in context of library tests #74681
  • [NativeAOT] Need to add support on Unix for recursive Crst #74680
  • [NativeAOT] Lock up at process shutdown on Windows when process has many threads #74678
  • Regression: Items are not being evicted from MemoryCache in .NET 6 #74676
  • [JIT] Assertion Prop Issues and Ideas #74671
    Future
  • Mono crash in System.Net.Requests tests on linux-arm64 #74667
  • IDBFS is Not defined #74664
  • UriBuilder should percent-encode its UserName or Password properties #74662
  • Clang LLVM emitting float instrinsics for bitwise operation for every input #74661
  • SqliteException: SQLite Error 1: 'no such table: Movie' #74659
  • [wasm-mt] Issues with enabling threads in .NET 7 RC 1 #74654
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: FormattableStringBuilder #74653
  • Using `StringValues` with `JsonSerializerContext` produces warnings with `7.0.0-preview*` #74652
    8.0.0
  • IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication path changes between Xamarin.iOS and dotnet 6 builds on iOS #74642
  • firefox-DebuggerTests - TaskCanceledException in random tests #74640
  • Side effects of boxing are getting removed #74635
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\VS-ia64-JIT\\V1.2-M02\\b28158\\b28158_64\\b28158_64.cmd #74632
    8.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\GetTotalPauseDuration\\GetTotalPauseDuration.cmd #74631
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient creates Quic threads even if HTTP/3 is not in use #74629
  • The mono_marshal_ilgen_init symbol is private in libmonosgen-2.0.dylib #74628
    7.0.0
  • ComWrappersTestsBuiltInComDisabled failing with NativeAOT #74620
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Throw helpers should return the valid value back #70515
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a few overloads to StringBuilder to eliminate temp allocs #68450
    Future
  • Move host customization logic into Microsoft.NET.HostModel #3580
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a feature to indicate an attribute is used to drive code generation #58994
    Future
  • Consider adding ArgumentEmptyException #59273
    Future
  • Matrix4x4 class only works on Windows #61178
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `charsRequired` out parameter to `TryParse` methods #62115
    Future
  • Can't find compatible framework message should specify x86/x64 on Windows #3592
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Improve the performance of enumerating over interface types. #62266
    Future
  • Move test_fx_ver under the cli/test folder #3515
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow set/get access to Array elements by absolute index. #62795
    Future
  • Refactor core-setup host code for understandability, maintainability #3153
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Create an interface for types with not-null returning ToString #68779
    Future
  • API Proposal: Generic System.Math Functions #63732
    Future
  • There are no dedicated DateOnly and TimeOnly type converters #74682
  • Implicit Vector/Tuple conversions #68145
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ISpanFormattable destination length #68154
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfZero() #68339
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: New Method: Enum.HasAnyFlag(Enum) #69262
    Future
  • Process.StandardOutput.Peek() hangs when StandardOutput contains no data. #74677
  • system.collections.concurrent.tests failed in CI #73038
    8.0.0
  • `System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests` failing with NRE in `S.T.Tasks.ConcurrentExclusiveSchedulerPair.ProcessConcurrentTasks` #73433
    Future
  • DataContractSerializerTests.DCS_MyPersonSurrogate_Stress fails in CI #73405
  • Failures in SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3 #73930
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: Allow alternate names for ActivatorUtilityConstructorAttribute #74655
  • JIT - slow generated code on Release for iterating simple array of struct #4659
    Future
  • `optAssertionProp_Ind` should eliminate `GTF_EXCEPT` better. #32248
    Future
  • [QUIC] Long running test: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently #73377
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml.Tests Fails on Android #50870
    Future
  • JIT: Optimize "X & 1 == 0" to "X & 1" #61412
    Future
  • Protection against assembly tampering #74569
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.Tests Fails on Android #50878
    Future
  • Send mail via System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient isn't working on .NET MAUI Android, but on .NET MAUI Windows and Xamarin.Forms Android #74576
    8.0.0
  • HttpClientHandler.AllowAutoRedirect is not working as expected on servers #74548
    8.0.0
  • AcceptAsync with existing Socket not implemented on Unix #1483
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Only widen short local stores #74685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Split Codespaces configuration based on development scenarios #74683
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] do not do shutdown for the main thread on Windows #74679
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Revert "[MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component (#71203)" #74675
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Revert "[MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component (#71203)" #74674
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix stack unwinding for NativeAOT on Unix x64 #74673
    os-linux, arch-x64, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that the result for PowMod is fully initialized #74672
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0] Use the regType for extracting the RegisterType #74670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #74669
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Skip System.Net.Requests tests on mono linux-arm64 #74668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Nick to fabric-bot config #74666
    area-Meta
  • Mark certain compiler-created locals as aliased #74665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Annotate System.Runtime.Serialization for AOT warnings #74663
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [MONO] Make mono_marshal_ilgen_init a public MONO_API function again #74660
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [MONO] Make mono_marshal_ilgen_init a public MONO_API function again #74658
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [draft] Update il range in optOptimizeBoolsUpdateTrees #74657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • #50866 enable configuration functional test on android #74651
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Retry logic for distributed transactions test #74648
    area-System.Transactions
  • #50868 enable configuration json tests on Android #74647
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • AcceptAsync with existing Socket support on Unix, Review Changes #74645
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Fix possible stack overflow in HttpListener #74644
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add `[NotNullIfNotNull]` to conversions from `string` to `JsonNode`. #74643
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Pass /NOEXP /NOIMPLIB options to the linker when publishing native AOT .exes #74641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix Mono Windows x86 build and runtime crash. #74639
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74638
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm-mt] Log exit codes in browser samples to prevent tests from timeouting #74637
  • Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #74634
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Don't crash on recursive native layout #74630
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pass over interop tests with NativeAOT #74627
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make sure we at least sweep the loh even when we wanted to compact it #74626
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make special_sweep_p a per heap member #74625
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Enable Console Logging test in NativeAOT #74381
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix some issues in `coreclr/nativeaot/docs/interop.md` #74656
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Root listener/connection while waiting on new connection/stream event #74450
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove unneeded references to JsonTypeInfo.PropertyInfoForTypeInfo. #74594
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • avoid allocation X509Chain if there is no certificate #74616
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • fix MaxResponseHeadersLength tests #74479
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Forward-substitute long calls on 32 bit targets #74502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Move linux-bionic leg to runtime-extra-platforms #74621
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure that the result for PowMod is fully initialized #74585
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Disable JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int on all configs #74636
  • [release/7.0] Retry logic for distributed transactions test #74649
    area-System.Transactions
  • Move Mono FreeBSD and Linux armv6 legs to the runtime-community pipeline #74622
  • `DisableRuntimeMarshalling` block Vector types #74612
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix typo in reflection test #74610
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Simplify platform macro definitions in PAL #73530
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Testing builds with v3beta pool - newer MacOS #74609
  • #50870 Enabling Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml tests on android #74575
    os-android, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • #50878 enable StringSegment tests on Android #74556
    os-android, area-Extensions-Primitives
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Issue was that if a BGC thread handles a mark stack overflow, #74571
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update documentation for analyzing PR failures #74615
    area-Meta
  • Always maintain committed_by_oh when heap_hard_limit is set #74624
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Allow address == g_gc_highest_address in get_skewed_basic_region_index_for_address #74543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Revert "Don't NativeAOT crossgen on ARM64 (#74211)" #74617
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Do not run DynamicGenerics test on mac #74618
  • CI: Tighten the path based triggers for jobs #74534
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consolidate importer spilling code V3 #73233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Show a warning when an explicit package reference to ILCompiler is added #74591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • For perf, remove Invoker pattern for fields #74614
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Clean `impReturnInstruction` up a bit #72887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Cross-compile cross-compilers for non-x64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Do not create `ADDR(HWI/SIMD)` in the inliner #74276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Do not remove certain casts with contained operands #74602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Convert SHFileOperation error to Win IO error #74607
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, community-contribution
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74366
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix XmlBinaryReader/XmlBinaryWriter on big-endian systems #74599
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption #74611
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 intrinsics for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use System.Numerics.IEqualityOperators.op_Equality in SpanHelper.T.cs where possible. #74567
    area-System.Memory, runtime-mono
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add custom comparer to use incremental generator caching for LoggerMessageGenerator and JsonSourceGenerator #74558
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix to skip adding self as next unrelated code list #74208
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing reducing CI load #74601
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wasm.build.tests for net6, net7 workloads #74608
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #74560
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Allow `RyuJitCompilation` to turn off tail calls #1966

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET tool installation consumes much more disk space than necessary #27502
  • `wasm-tools` workload isn't supported on `arm64` version of Docker #27493
  • Add support for root assembly trimming mode #27492
  • dotnet clean requires a RID if SelfContained=true in project file but no RID is set #27488

Closed

  • clarify API Compatibility rules for virtual keyword #26169

PullRequests

Created

  • apicompat: sort suppressions #27500
    Area-ApiCompat
  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    Area-Templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27479
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update LocalizableStrings.zh-Hans.xlf #27474
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • emit diagnostic for adding sealed to interface member #27421
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Add test for framework trimming warnings #27461
    Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1970576 #27439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Moved the options to new \ new create level #27455
    area: dotnet new

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Disallow interfaces with static virtual members as type arguments #5955

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #6382

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Change signature" drops namespace qualifier for alias-qualified names #63628
  • Autocompletion for `extern alias` directives suggests field/property/method names #63626
  • CSharpNewDocumentFormatting SDK tests are flaky due to restore issues #63620
  • Symbol renaming takes forever due to the wrong MEF import of IToolTipPresenterFactory #63619
    17.4
  • BadImageFormatException for abstract static from non-generic interface #63617
  • Exception in `CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider` when callsites provide not enough arguments #63615
    17.4
  • `new str$$` completion shows two lowercase `string`, one as keyword and one as class name #63614
    17.4
  • Memory Leak when user InteractiveAssemblyLoader.RegisterDependency() #63613
    Backlog

Closed

  • "Error CS8034: failed to load Analyzer", if analyzer is packed with native dependencies #63396
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32826.146 #63627
  • Hot reload erases captured local variables in async function #63294
    17.4
  • Edit.SubwordExpandSelection should not include quotes #63539
    Backlog
  • Opening the interactive window hits debug assertion in CSharpSemanticModel.GetImportScopesCore #61426
    17.3
  • ServiceHub.Host.Node.x86.exe has been using 40% of my system resources all morning even though I'm not using VS2022 (dump provided) #63611
  • C# Deconstruct method as a default interface member on a generic interface is not detected from concrete types #63612
  • Analyzer throws warning RS1022 while creating a new AdhocWorkspace() #63589

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix casing in VB file #63630
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Delete Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.Desktop #63624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unskip error list tests #63623
  • Re-enable argument provider integration tests #63622
    Area-IDE
  • Add a try/catch to help us track down a crash #63621
    Area-IDE
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Convert workspaces and new document formatting integration tests to new framework #63610
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Don't include expanded items if there are exclusive items in the list #63625
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Emit MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute in VB #63194
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Simplify RecoverableText #63606
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63609
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Semantic Snippets - fix tabstop location for cursor in blocks #63519
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixes EnC slot mapping for certain kinds of synthesized variables lifted to state machine fields #63295
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update versions of external packages we reference #63544
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update NuGet version to fix MSBuildWorkspace tests #63603
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #63618
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move Windows builds to new images #63482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63608
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63631
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Fix possible race condition in AnalyzerConfigWithInferredIndentationOptions #62545
    Area-IDE
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to -Svc pool provider in release branches #63585
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add stages to the Roslyn CI #63607
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Update 17 3 packages #63599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Use 'checked' names for synthesized vb intrinsic operators #63604
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not show "Convert to raw string" refactoring for C# version lower than 11 #63593
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • No IDE0060 for unused parameter in partial method implementation #63530
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic Snippets - Command Handler tests #63581
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade System.Memory to fully fix another MSBuild loading issue #63545
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CookieOptions - Domain property not leading to expected behavior #43579
  • asp.net core identity two factor remember me cookie being overwritten #43577
  • Perf improvement: https, json_actix #43574
  • [Feature Request]: Make LinkGenerator support complex objects #43572
  • Browser Link Errors after Disconnect #43571
  • using the blazorwebview control to load a local and external plugin of blazor webassembly program in the Maui blazor program does not work #43565
  • Blazor Webassembly Authentication with OpenIDConnect endsession missing id_token_hint #43563
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity UserManager - Delete user AuthenticatorKey and RecoveryCodes #43562

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly App with user accounts won't run in IIS #43399
  • Support more ProblemDetails Titles out-of-the-box for Results.Problem() #36417
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Is it possible to log to a text file with ASP Core .Net 6? #43564
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, json #43350
  • Perf improvement: json #43425
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #43549
  • Allow endpoint filter attribute #43421
  • Hot reload no longer works in dotnet CLI #43540
  • CORS policy per request #43526
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] cmake build for MSYS/Mingw64 on windows failed #43560
  • `launchUrl` and `launchBrowser` settings not respected #43531
  • Blazor custom events incorrect currentTarget #42344
    Discussions
  • Hot reload not work for combination of static render and wasm #42439
    Discussions
  • Errors when add "Razor Class Library" reference to .NET6 Blazor Webassembly #43377
  • ASP.NET Core 7.0 SystemTextJsonValidationMetadataProvider is inconsistent #43524

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43578
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [Backport] [SignalR] Fix WebSocket client close when network disappears #43576
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • docs: Remove syntax error in xml docs for `AuthenticationBuilder` #43575
    area-security, community-contribution
  • fix #43523 Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #43558
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Improve port search retry logic #43557
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43573
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43534
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Support more ProblemDetails Titles out-of-the-box #43232
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-alpha1
  • Make skipComponentGovernanceDetection a variable #43477
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • [SignalR] Fix WebSocket client close when network disappears #43518
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, 7.0-rc2
  • Update Microsoft.Web.Xdt version #43521
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Workaround Xunit bug casting InlineData #43570
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43566
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mac Catalyst does not support resizing or repositioning windows programatically #9704
  • Setting the X/Y positions initial values on Window doesn't propagate when the window is first initialized #9703
    .NET 7
  • Switching the MAUI Controls Gallery to RTL causes the currently visible view to not resize correctly #9702
  • Clicking the RTL Switch in our control gallery makes it unclickable #9701
  • Running a .NET MAUI Blazor app from VS that was previously built and run takes a surprisingly long time #9700
  • Use of FlyoutHeaderBehavior="CollapseOnScroll" causes an exceptio #9699
  • maui workloads not installed through visual studio installer #9698
  • Maui android published apk crash #9697
  • Cannot assign permissions for MAUI app in windows #9696
  • Top Navigation Menu bar does not show up on MAUIBlazor deployed to iPhone with iOS 15.6 #9693
  • Need Material Design implemented as part of Visual quite like Xamarin.Forms #9689
  • Infinity loop lifecycle when unfocused from the app between OnDisappearing and OnAppearing #9688
  • Shell TitleView disappearing on tab change #9687
  • Shell.FlyoutFooterTemplate doesn't display Grid control #9685
  • Native Crash when BindingContext is used on iOS Simulator #9683
  • [Enhancement] Double Flyover in Shell Copy of feature request from XForms #9674
  • Adding a conditional compilation symbol generate the symbol 'TRACETRACE' #9673
  • Not Rules for Android JAR SDK #9672
  • StackLayout, slow adding #9671
  • ISecureStorage.GetAsync should return nullable string #9670
  • Customised CollectionView (inherited from) does not [ScrollTo] and display selection correctly #9669

Closed

  • Move Maps to handler architecture #3933
    7.0-rc1
  • Warning in MAUI when referencing a project with GenerateDocumentationFile true #7272
  • Docs don't show up in Intellisense for .NET MAUI types #5341
    6.0-servicing
  • Problem with object on Android platform #9601

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Maui project capability for development #9695
  • [Windows ] Fix Shell SearchBarHandler #9679

  • [Housekeeping] Added new Border samples to the Gallery #9676
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Enable Graphics API docs generation #9675
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Implement PointerGestureRecognizer #9592
    area/desktop 🖥️

    platform/windows 🪟, area/lifecycle 🔁, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1

  • [net6.0][Tizen] Replace Tizen Backend engine #9620
    community ✨, partner/tizen
  • Remove code left in while spiking secondary click on android #9684
  • Changed default Border StrokeShape value #8521
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 7
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • [main][Tizen] Replace Tizen Backend engine #9619

  • Bump System.Text.Json from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #9603

Updated

  • Azure Synapse: primary keys need to be NOT ENFORCED in migrations #28898

  • Concurrency Check #28896
  • Translation of method 'string.Format' failed - EF error. #28894

Closed

    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update BenchmarkDotNet version #28901

Merged

Updated
